Package net.minestom.server.storage

Class StorageLocation

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.storage.StorageLocation
@Deprecated public class StorageLocation extends Object
Deprecated.
Represents an area which contain data.

Each StorageLocation has a StorageSystem associated to it which is used to save and retrieve data from keys.

    • set

      public <T> void set(@NotNull @NotNull String key, @NotNull T object, @NotNull @NotNull Class<T> type)
      Deprecated.
      Sets an object associated to a key.

      It does use registered DataType located on DataManager So you need to register all the types that you use.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the data
      Parameters:
      key - the key
      object - the data object
      type - the class of the data

      It does use registered DataType located on DataManager. So you need to register all the types that you use.

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:

      type - the class of the data
      Returns:
      the object associated to the key

    • getAndCloneData

      public void getAndCloneData(@NotNull @NotNull String key, @NotNull @NotNull DataContainer dataContainer)
      Deprecated.
      Gets an unique SerializableData which is cloned if cached or retrieved with the default StorageSystem.
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the data
      dataContainer - the DataContainer which will contain the new data

    • getAndCacheData

      public void getAndCacheData(@NotNull @NotNull String key, @NotNull @NotNull DataContainer dataContainer)
      Deprecated.
      Gets a shared SerializableData if already in memory or retrieve it from the default StorageSystem and save it in cache for further request. Those cached data can be saved using saveCachedData() or individually with saveCachedData(String) It is also possible to save an individual data and remove it directly with saveAndRemoveCachedData(String)
      Parameters:
      key - the key of the data
      dataContainer - the DataContainer which will contain the new data

    • saveAndRemoveCachedData

      public void saveAndRemoveCachedData(@NotNull @NotNull String key)
      Deprecated.
      Saves a specified cached SerializableData and remove it from memory.
      Parameters:
      key - the specified cached data key

    • saveCachedData

      public void saveCachedData()

      Saves the all the cached SerializableData.

      Deprecated.
      Saves an unique cached SerializableData.
      Parameters:
      key - the data key
